website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-operate camera that comes with lots of accessories for an all-in-one setup.
pros: This point-and-shoot helps beginner photographers take beautiful photos with ease
The 20.0 megapixel CCD sensor lends high-quality images
The bundle includes useful accessories for getting started: SanDisk Ultra 32GB SD Card, Replacement Lithium Ion Battery, Travel Quick Charger
This bundle is a perfect way to get started in photography with a low buy-in
cons: Some users expected the camera bundle to include a user's manual, but they easily found it online

customer_reviews.title: am NOT smart phone fan
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior...travel a lot...am NOT smart phone fan....I needed a simple , high quality camera to keep in my pocket while traveling. This one suits my needs perfectly....compact...has all the needed features. I had a Nikon ...time to replace....it actually had too many features. Buying this as a package with what you need....is simple and easy....and you are ready to go! All in all...great value...delivered two days with Prime! Life is good even when you get old....keep it simple!!! My career marketing...learned that too many features...more things to fail...best to buy one step above the basic....last longer!!
customer_reviews.author: tom colucci

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures for short money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 71 year old who has pondered for years whether I should buy a better, more expensive camera although my PowerShot ELPH 100 HS (bought 5 yrs ago) worked well, and my pictures were satisfactory. After hours of research, I was still hesitant to shell out big money due to budgetary constraints. Then, I came across the Canon PowerShot 180 bundle. All I can say is, I'm completely satisfied with this camera, It's a great value, takes wonderful pictures, and has a bundle of accessories included. Run to your computer (or walk) and check out what's being offered! Few purchases please me as much, and I make dozens annually, mostly through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Coady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera to have when you need something small that takes better pictures then your smartphone. It's small and easy to use. All the stuff that comes with the Kit its great as well. Definitely worth the money getting this camera with accessory kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... few seconds to focus but the pictures came out good. I wish you could charge it with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few seconds to focus but the pictures came out good. I wish you could charge it with a regular cable instead of having to take the battery out and put it in a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and a great bunch of super cool 'extras' came in the bundle. The camera takes sharp photos and uploading them is easy peasy too. I highly recommend this camera if you are looking for something simple and inexpensive but works great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Richards

customer_reviews.title: A very nice camera and collection of accessories
customer_reviews.text: A very nice camera and collection of accessories. My only complaint was the lack of an instruction manual. When I went on line to download the manual it filled a 3 ring binder!
customer_reviews.author: F. Clef

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Xmas and she loves it and uses it all the time. It take amazingly beautiful and clear pictures and videos
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews we purchased this package deal to replace our old camera that was being held together with rubber bands overall this is a great value for everything you get. We are fully satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Okay camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is okay, not better than the average smartphone camera. The charger for the battery that came with the camera not the one in the accessories did not work, it is broken. Also the SD card reader doesn't fit the SD card for the camera... Its for mini SD cards. I feel like this was not the best camera I could have bought for the price but lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: OmgAshley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a nice little camera. HOWEVER, only a very basic manual comes with it. I am not a technical person but I am not a stupid person either but without a detailed manual, it is difficult to operate the camera. I get into modes that I don't even know what they are or how to turn them off or on. I have paid for a product that I really cannot use to the fullest without a manual. I would think the maker would want you to be able to use all the functions and enjoy the camera. How cheap of them.
customer_reviews.author: Born in the USA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Delivery on time,,,and my new camera is awesome easy to work great pics having lots of fun can't wait to go on vacation Ty Ty...
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: It took great pictures. Easy to transfer to a computer
customer_reviews.text: Phone was out of memory - needed this to take pictures at a wedding. It took great pictures. Easy to transfer to a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Douma

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Value - just don't pony up for the package of extras.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the kit with extras. It's nice to have the extra battery and case, rest was junk (tripod broke right away)! The strength of this camera is the length of time the batteries last and the amount of pics you can now fit on the larger memory cards - thousands of pics! I which it had a little better "shake" option - pics very easily blurred. It also has kind of a "cheap" feel. At the price range though it's not a bad buy. I just wouldn't by the package - not worth it. If you want a tripod for it - buy seperate - Amazon makes a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Byron

customer_reviews.title: Quality Photos at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the photos and videos, as well as the size of the camera. It has easy to use functions and a variety of options when taking photos, etc. I opted for a bundle of accessories to go with the camera and am very satisfied with everything included. The cost of the camera and bundle package was quite reasonable. I have been using the camera to be really familiar with all the functions so I am able to easily use it on an upcoming vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter's 7th B-Day; while most of the accessories were too much for a little person, overall a great package and camera. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara/Tempe, AZ

customer_reviews.title: this is a pretty good camera
customer_reviews.text: Well, for a P&S, this is a pretty good camera. Light weight and small enough to fit in a pocket, easy to use settings (yeah, you can throw that manual away), nice results (though not as good as a smart-phone. probably). Use the auto mode and go ahead and shoot, or choose your own settings. One thing I miss is the copy and edit functions that I had in my other P&S's. I was gonna buy an extra battery and memory card and camera case, anyway- so this package was both a deal and convenient. I might even use that wee tripod that weights only ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Donnabeth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Images
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this camera ever again! Very Grainy shots. Very poor even in sun light.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera....amazing bundle...great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son-in-law. He absolutely loves it! The picture quality is amazing. The bundle that came with it provided EVERYTHING that he needed to run out and begin take pics (which he did within 15 mins of getting it).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the money. However, it would be much better if it had an Eye view port. The LED screen is hard to see when outside in bright conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it’s compact. I’m a vlogger on social media so portability is important. The only thing I wish was better was the volume while recording outside or in general. I have the red one my favorite color and with alllllll these accessories that come with....it’s definitely worth the price. I know cause I compared and some come with one accessory for a higher price. I eventually will upgrade to a canon 64g, one with a better mic.From Amazon of course. I gave it 4stars for ease of use because of the mic volume. Overall pretty good camera quality for a compact.
customer_reviews.author: Tamira Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not for live-streaming, but a great value deal!
customer_reviews.text: The whole package was fantastic! Camera works great for video and pictures! Bought the USB cable sapperstely that helps transfer photos and video but I thought would work for live-streaming. This camera doesn't not support live-streaming. But this company had great products and everything was in the box in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh no! No driver for MAC OSMojave
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this camera. Took hundreds of photos and now learn that there is no driver to download so that I can upload the images. I guess I will order a card reader and see if that works. CANON SHOULD OFFER A DRIVER FOR NEW MACS.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brown

customer_reviews.title: I lost my previous Canon point and shoot and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my previous Canon point and shoot and this was a replacement. It works as well as the last one. I needed to change the pixel size and downloaded the manual and found out how to do it quickly. So all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Gray

customer_reviews.title: Decent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you need a camera while on vacation and do not want to use your phone, this is a nice substitute. Takes clear photos, easy to use and water proof. It's small enough to fit in your pocket, yes just like your cell phone. I choose this camera after reading the reviews and I did not want to risk losing my cell phone while hiking in a foreign country. It did not disappoint. It's easy to transport your photos to your computer or Apple device. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie S

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, fantastic. I bought this for my wife who prefers not to use her phone for filming her line-dance class. My only complaint is that the camera has no USB connector. You have to remove the SD card and use an adapter (included) in order to move pictures onto your PC or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Player - Senior Elite

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for her birthday. She doesn't like taking pictures on her phone and wanted a simple camera she can bring along in her purse when we go to family gatherings, parties, ect. We've only used it once so far but it seems to be a good camera. The amount of other items in this package were great and a huge bonus for her gift. The fact that it comes with the extra rechargeable battery and the charger is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Camera is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Silver) w/ 32GB Accessory Bundle and couldn't be more pleased. The camera is easy to use and the bundle comes with everything needed. The extra battery and charger are especially nice, to always have a battery charged and ready to go. I would highly recommend this camera bundle.
customer_reviews.author: starsky222

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, small light and compact but does not take very clear pictures. I have a sony camera and the zoom was sticking so i bought this to replace it but picture quality just wasnt there
customer_reviews.author: jodi senn

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little camera. So simple to use. The photos my appear blurry while snapping, but upon completion - -very clear and crisp. You can't go wrong for the price, especially if you are "ole school." The accessory package really puts it over the top.
customer_reviews.author: 1Friend

customer_reviews.title: I wish I never bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Nikon Coolpix that i dropped and damaged. The camera has far less features than the old Nikon did but was described as having multiple shooting modes. The only ones that are easy to use are auto and portrait. When holding the camera up to take pictures it is very easy to accidentally press a button that you don't want. I would like to return it, but I was on vacation when the 30 days came up.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great bundle
customer_reviews.text: This camera still holds up. Great pictures, ease of use and reliability. Lots of extras come in the bundle. Does anyone know what the plastic graph/grid sheets are for? Nice to have an extra battery (haven't had to use it yet, so I'm not sure of it's endurance). Recommend getting a backup SD card if you don't already have one.
customer_reviews.author: bizchecker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of gadgets included.
customer_reviews.text: What I found I liked the most was the little "card" wallet and the travel charging equipment. I doubt I use some of the gadgets that come with it, but I would rather have them than want them and not getting it.
customer_reviews.author: L.Easley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this camera is cute, small and easy to use. Starts up fast to capture moments too. This kit comes with lots of little tools and accessories which is very cool! I especially love the little uploading usb tool!
customer_reviews.author: TStephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter bought this with her birthday money. Great first camera to help her get acquainted with basic functions. The kit was amazing and it included so many things! Definitely worth the money. The camera takes very nice pictures. The tripod is very handy, specially when she is recording a video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAmily Trip camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our family trip to Florida an Disney and it worked great. I was impressed with the quality of the pictures from this camera. Also, everything that came with it is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith-Sattison

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great- the entire package covers all I need So far, no negatives to report
customer_reviews.author: Herkimer Smith

customer_reviews.title: I got it to replace my older one
customer_reviews.text: I had a few models back and it was time for the upgrade. I enjoyed the extras. I use this camera for my photos for my website. It isn't the super hardcore pro camera but it is good for my needs. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Takes time...
customer_reviews.text: Still do not know a lot about it..was looking for a simple camera and was overwhelmed by wording and technology..slow but sure getting comfortable wit it ..and perhaps it is simple for a product now days.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased in Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: My oldest loved this camera
customer_reviews.text: My oldest loved this camera. Great great great pictures come out clear storage space is good. Everything is included it feels a lot lighter then u expected but once everything is put together it feel a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! Took pics at daughters birthday! Nice quality! Great price! Lots of accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Ronelynn Mebs

customer_reviews.title: Good eBay listing camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take photos for eBay listings. I was looking for an inexpensive camera from quality brand name that comes with rechargeable batteries. So far it has met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Holt

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've only taken three pictures so far, They were good quality. The camera was a little confusing Getting to know, but now I love it, I just put it on automatic and away we go.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very easy to use. Great to take on tripsbevause it isn’t bulky. I have already taken it on a couple of trip. Took a lot of photos and they came out very well
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dowtin

customer_reviews.title: No instructions Sad
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact could carry it anywhere. Of course with a big chip in it i have not down loaded yet but view in camera look good. One concern is NO real instructions. They give you all these parts and say nothing about them. I am guessing on how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great Package
customer_reviews.text: Love Powershot Canons. These guys have put together a great camera package with almost all the accessories you may need. Only beef, maybe too small.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaFoxCo LLC

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera, compact design
customer_reviews.text: Well made product, perfect fits in ly pocket or use with my belt carrier. Great photos, enlarges images nicely. easy to use . Would buy again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: fun at one, cooking is the game

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera and accessory kit was a great buy. I have used it several times and the pictures are beautiful. I wanted a camera that was simple to use and small to carry and this one fits the bill. Plus all the accessories work well and are grealy helpful!
customer_reviews.author: MzLucyVP

customer_reviews.title: Great camera package!
customer_reviews.text: I received it and it was exactly as stated in the Amazon description. I like the size of the camera. It takes great pictures, is easy to use, and all the accessories are good quality. It is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Gillum

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome little camera with all the accessories and then the ...
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome little camera with all the accessories and then the kit contains some more accessories....I am in love with it all, including the price. Heading to Japan very soon and I am so excited to be taking it with me to take some amazing pictures of my grandbabies.....Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Klein

customer_reviews.title: It seemed to be a very good camera until the on/off button failed to work while ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be a very good camera until the on/off button failed to work while I was on vacation. When it worked it was good
customer_reviews.author: Judy G Carver

customer_reviews.title: Average camera
customer_reviews.text: Average camera. No complaints but not that great. Good cheap little camera if you want something for a good price point. Go elsewhere if you're looking for exceptional quality. Limited features for a digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: ... in the past so knew i would have a great purchase. It came with more than I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used the product in the past so knew i would have a great purchase. It came with more than I thought I would get too!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to get phone quality pictures out of a camera but I suppose for what ever reason that seems impassible with out spending a a lot more for it it works and the battery last a long time so
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Houle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not use to using an actual Point n Shoot vs. my cell. Overall was good. Even taking pictures in the Rain. Quality seems overall well too. Wish the wristlet could have a snug feature on it. LOVE the bundle/kit. I deff blew through both batteries that day. Took 528 pix.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Roh

customer_reviews.title: Fine little camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's for quick, non-professional but personally appealing photos. Wonderful for travel, or just quick shots around the house!
customer_reviews.author: A kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Any chance of getting a refund or credit?
customer_reviews.text: I am in Real Estate and must rely on my photos to entice the public to call on my listings. I purchased this package and must say it was such a disappointment and I feel as though it is a wasted purchase, as I cannot use it. The camera is quite small and difficult to handle. Please let me know your policy. Everything in the package is in great order. The card is used, but I can replace it. Nothing important on it...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Adkin

customer_reviews.title: Great bundled package
customer_reviews.text: Great bundled package... But really lacking in instructions/troubleshooting/tips... Guess I'll be winging it...
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo bug

customer_reviews.title: The Canon PowerShot is a fine, little camera for those of us non-professionals
customer_reviews.text: The Canon PowerShot is a fine, little camera for those of us non-professionals. I was very impressed with the package sent from Focus Camera as it contained things I never expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R. Walz

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I bought it to replace an ELPH I bought 10 years ago that stopped working. Best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: daisyl376

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera being small and light weight. It does take very clear and clean photos. I don’t like that it did not come with a cord to download photos from the camera to the computer. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Ingefara

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Best Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Canon Power Shot and it comes with everything and more than what I expected for such a great price! It takes videos, comes with a travel adapter, an extra memory card, and a memory stick to transfer to my computer. What a DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes terrible pictures...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I ordered this camera, thought Canon was a good name. The pictures are not good and my phone takes better photos.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Granddaughters birthday. She says she loves it. I dont know about picture quality and other questions.
customer_reviews.author: serenity62

customer_reviews.title: Travel Charger
customer_reviews.text: I don't see the reason to add the travel charger as the Canon battery doesn't fit the charger. Also, it did not come with a USB plug to transfer photos but I don't see it listed so I guess I should have looked closer before purchasing. The camera is great though and my son really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY

customer_reviews.title: I should have gotten full cost $64.00
customer_reviews.text: I was taking care of sick Mom, didn't open until the day I called, It didn't work so I sent it back, perfect condition with all attachments, I want the warrenty I purchased and the full amount I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great "pocket" camera
customer_reviews.text: Great "pocket" camera.... while you can use a phone, I am a big fan of using a separate camera, higher quality images, more cotrol over composition as well as ability to use much higher capacity cards
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Takes beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Takes beautiful pictures! It's perfect for our family. If you're like me & just need a simple camera to take pictures of your life/family, this is the right camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like the zoom picture feature.  I need to take pictures from far away.
customer_reviews.text: i am using it for pictures of plants that people can easily use in the heat. Have to take pictures in neighborhoods of full grown trees, plants etc. Sometimes I have to take them in a busy street, so zoom feature is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Heuneman

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great camera! Easy to use. However after I bought it I saw a Sony waterproof and shock proof camera at target for the same price. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Cretin

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: Fuzzy and grains lcd screen said 20 mp camera says 18 mp I would say it’s more like 10 mp
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping track of projects, before, during, and after, without a lot of unnecessary functions, easy point and shoot, very clear images, easy to transfer to computer files. Just plain easy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sprow

customer_reviews.title: Would be a good camera for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take good pictures for me, I was very disappointed because I wanted a compact size camera.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: This unit has the size and all the bells and ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit has the size and all the bells and whistles that I want in a small pocket sized camera. However this particular unit has a problem with the auto focus. I will have to send it back to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Welch

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera . Easy to use . Takes wonderful pictures or videos . Carry it in my purse . Very happy with the bundle .
customer_reviews.author: Mary Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Kind of lightweight for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera but some of the equipment it came with is obsolete. Lighter than I expected. I worry about the construction of the battery door but so far it is working okay.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann fenton

customer_reviews.title: but it is replacing a similar one that I loved don't like that there is no manual with it
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet, but it is replacing a similar one that I loved don't like that there is no manual with it though
customer_reviews.author: Josie P. Little

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of extras stuff you never use. The card reader is for the wrong card. Battery to to large. Good thing I already had replacements of those. But over all its OK
customer_reviews.author: Mclendenon

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: The little devil failed after about 20 photos. No fun at all. DTR
customer_reviews.author: DTR

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, full feature camera with full accessories including two batteries
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the features I had hoped for including 8x optical zoom, great resolution and a movie camera all combined in one very small unit. Handy to have available for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Stan S.

customer_reviews.title: Color was perfect .
customer_reviews.text: At my age i have to read the instructions very , very carefully . Son explained some of the advantages .I WILL ENJOY THIS FOR A VERY LONG TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann L. Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Slow to receive, cleaning fluid bottle lid broken
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was slow, 5 days to receive a Prime order (should have been free 2-day air)...and the lid to the cleaning fluid bottle lid was broken so everything that wasn't sealed was soaked. Otherwise everything was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine camera, and is just what I wanted. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with indoor photos
customer_reviews.text: I find it okay for outdoor photos. Not pleased with indoor photos. Will continue to work with it and if it improves as my skill improves, I will edit the review.
customer_reviews.author: Movie goer 1966

customer_reviews.title: Just purchase the camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great. Accessories are not germane and are redundant. Wish I would have just purchased the camera.
customer_reviews.author: RonM

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good value for the money. I ordered a package, loved the extra battery!
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Good pocket sized camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the size and ease of using. The accessories, I have used some and some I have not. I am happy with the purschase.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH FRANKLIN

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need, and a good camera too.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 15 year old. It is being used a lot and takes great pictures. I recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: A great deal with more then you would get if you ...
customer_reviews.text: A great deal with more then you would get if you went shopping for a digital camera. The case however is too small to carry a few extras, like the tiny tripod. I had to find another case.
customer_reviews.author: rgashton

customer_reviews.title: Gives great clear shots
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be used during home inspections. So far it has been good and east to see. Wish it came with some extras though.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed...all inclusive, everything you need in one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old Sony camera that broke when my toddler got ahold of it. I love cannon so I decided to purchase the pocket cam perfect for trips on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Mysty

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Canon products. Live em all
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need! I haven't used it yet, ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need! I haven't used it yet, but I am going on a trip and will use it a lot!

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
product_meta.description: Color:Red| Style:32GB BundleThe Canon Powers hot ELPH 180 packs a number of great features into a digital camera that s small enough to fit in your pocket. The ELPH features 8x optical zoom paired with a 20 Megapixel Image sensor to ensure you all always get crisp, clear pictures whether you re taking landscape shots or a close-up of someone S face from across the room. Built in image stabilization helps reduce blur when you re shooting at night or at maximum zoom when even slight vibrations can result in blurry images. The camera S DIGIC+ image processor writes image information to the memory card quickly to minimize downtime between shots. The ELPH 180 can also record video content in HD 720P format for times when you want to capture more than still images. Includes: Canon Powers hot ELPH 180 20 MP digital camera (Red) SanDisk ultra 32GB SD card focus rechargeable replacement lithium ion battery travel quick charger focus medium point & shoot Camera accessory bundle
feature_bullets: 8x Optical Zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer helps you capture images with flexibility and ease
20.0 Megapixel CCD sensor combines with the DIGIC 4+ Image Processor to help deliver stunning image quality
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings based on predefined shooting situations
Includes - SanDisk Ultra 32GB SD Card / Replacement Lithium Ion Battery / Travel Quick Charger / Focus Medium Point & Shoot Camera Accessory Bundle
